lead_paragraph: The rapper and godfather of the current boom in fashionable concert merch goes global with a constellation of temporary stores.

headline.print_headline: Kanye’s Merchandise Is on Tour Before He Is
headline.main: Before the Tour, the Store: In 21 Cities Around the World, Kanye West Sets Up Shop

snippet: The rapper and godfather of the current boom in fashionable concert merch goes global with a constellation of temporary stores....
abstract: Rapper Kanye West debuts clothing and merchandise line inspired by his Saint Pablo tour and album in pop-up shops across globe.
